abstract: Martin Brodeur left the game at Prudential Center after the first period with an injury the club called "upper body soreness."
snippet: Martin Brodeur left the game at Prudential Center after the first period with an injury the club called "upper body soreness."
lead_paragraph: NEWARK - The backup Devils goalie Johan Hedberg knew for days that he would not be starting on Thursday against the Los Angeles Kings, but he always tries to be ready just in case. The preparation paid off when Hedberg replaced an injured Martin Brodeur, stopped all 16 shots he faced in regulation and two more in a shootout to give the Devils a 2-1 win.

headline.main: Hedberg Replaces Brodeur and Saves Everything
